text:
Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone's wedding is definitely going to make a cut in the list of Bollywood's most royal weddings of the decade.
From their wedding destinationin Italy to their reception and dance parties after the wedding, everything about their wedding was royal.
Instagram
Their last reception in Mumbai was for their friends from the media fraternity and the couple left no stone unturned in making sure that the celebrations are up to the mark. Apart from the celebrations, the couple's style game was on point too (As always!)

PTI
Twinning in white and gold, the pictures that flooded our timeline looked like they're straight out of a dreamy fairy-tale. Deepika chose a mesmerizing ivory and gold Abu Jani Sandeep Khosla chikankari lehenga and in no time, it became every girl's dream outfit!
Agencies
The masterpiece that Deepika chose was special for reasons more than one and there was a lot that went behind creating this special piece. In case you are wondering what we're talking about, watch this video that will give you a glimpse of all the hard work that went behind putting this piece together. Reports claim that her Mumbai reception lehenga took 16000 man-hours to make. Without further ado, watch the video.
